# crown-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The crown-button element.

## Properties

| Property       | Attribute          | Description                                                  | Type      | Default     |
| -------------- | ------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| `color`        | `color`            | The color of the button.                                     | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `disabled`     | `disabled`         | Indicates whether the button is disabled.                    | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `href`         | `href`             | The URL if the button behaves as a link.                     | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `size`         | `size`             | The size of the button (e.g., small, medium, large).         | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `target`       | `target`           | The target window or frame if the button behaves as a link.  | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `type`         | `type`             | The type of the button (e.g., submit, reset, button).        | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `useShadowDOM` | `use-shadow-d-o-m` |                                                              | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `variant`      | `variant`          | The variant of the button (e.g., outlined, contained, text). | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot       | Description                                                      |
| ---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
|            | The default slot for the button text.                            |
| `"after"`  | The slot for the content to be displayed after the button text.  |
| `"before"` | The slot for the content to be displayed before the button text. |
